thread.title: Joey Essex leaves Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in hysterics as he reveals why he WON'T date Jorgie Porter
thread.title_full: Joey Essex leaves Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in hysterics as he reveals why he WON'T date Jorgie Porter

author: Hayley Minn
title: Joey Essex leaves Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in hysterics as he reveals why he WON'T date Jorgie Porter
text:
Joey Essex leaves Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in hysterics as he reveals why he WON'T date Jorgie Porter The Celebs Go Dating star famously got together with Stephanie Pratt last series Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Why won't Joey Essex date Jorgie Porter ? Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Joey Essex famously got together with Stephanie Pratt on Celebs Go Dating last year - despite the celebs are meant to date members of the public. 
And he had Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in hysterics as he revealed exactly why he won’t be repeating himself and doing the same thing with Jorgie Porter this year. 
Having revealed he and Jorgie weren’t going to happen, because they’re not each other’s type, the former Hollyoaks actress tweeted: “LOVE that you just pied me @thismorning I think we'd both be too weird.” 
Holly then told Joey what she’d tweeted, and he said: “She’s never really chatted to me. I didn’t know she fancied me!” Read More Joey Essex won't be dating Jorgie Porter (Photo: ITV) Because his contract won't allow it! (Photo: ITV) Holly and Phil were in hysterics (Photo: ITV) 
But our hopes of Joegie were immediately dashed, as Joey revealed: “I’m not going to break the rules again. 
“I’m not allowed to, it’s in my contract that I can’t date the other celebs!” 
Holly and Phil were in hysterics at Joey’s revelation, and Jorgie added on Twitter: “It’s in my contract not to talk to him!” 
And Joey’s cousin Chloe Sims clearly thinks the pair should get together. Read More Joey Essex took a girl to KFC on a first date - and she really wasn't happy Jorgie is also on Celebs Go Dating (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
She tweeted: “Well as he's big cousin I think you are both the right amount of ‘weird’ as you put it.. I think you'd be the most fun & cute couple!!!” 
Elsewhere in Joey’s This Morning chat, Holly and Phil were shocked to learn he’d taken a date to KFC - FOR FREE! 
He revealed: “I’ve got this black card for KFC, so I get £200 of KFC a day! Could it actually happen? (Photo: Twitter/Jorgie Porter) Jorgie isn't talking to him because of her contract (Photo: Twitter/Jorgie Porter) 
“I pull out this card, and there’s bare KFC everywhere. 
“It was a jokes date.” 
*This Morning continues on ITV1 weekdays at 10.30am Like us on Facebook
